channel.title: Anyone know how to add Special Attacks on players (Or in the wilderness)?

item.title: Anyone know how to add Special Attacks on players (Or in the wilderness)?
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

First of all you don’t need a void for specials.

Make sure you have added your specials cases in specials.java.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone know how to add Special Attacks on players (Or in the wilderness)?

item.title: Anyone know how to add Special Attacks on players (Or in the wilderness)?
item.dc:creator: @skinzoskinz skinzoskinz
item.description:
@skinzoskinz wrote:

Hey, I’m having trouble getting my special attacks to work in the Wilderness… They work fine on NPC’s using this code:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13643 && specialAmount <= 49) // stat ham { specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy left."); } if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13643 && specialAmount >= 50) { // stat ham specialDamage = 60 + misc.random(20); specialAmount -= 50; }

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13643 && specialAmount >= 50) { animation(59, EnemyY, EnemyX); animation(435, EnemyY, EnemyX); animation(346, EnemyY, EnemyX); calculateSpecial(); hitDiff = specialDamage; usingSpecial = false; specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; }

I’ve also tried to make a void to help it…

[code] public void statSpec()
{
if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13643 )
{
setAnimation(1667);
actionTimer = 4;
SpecDamgNPC(60 + misc.random(20));
resetAnimation();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecialDelay -= 1;
}
else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13643)
{
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];

        SpecDamg(50 + misc.random(20));
        actionTimer = 4;
        teleportToX = absX;
        teleportToY = absY;
        SpecialDelay -= 3;
    specialAmount -= 50;
    }

}[/code]

…

None of these make it work on players… i’m assuming that the ints are attempting to apply it to a player… but for some reason it doesnt work… I’ve just taken that statSpec() base from another special (G Maul)… and changed it, the G Maul works in the wilderness.

Is it because the statius is a custom item?

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone know how to add Special Attacks on players (Or in the wilderness)?
